headline.main: EVENTS OF INTEREST IN SHIPPING WORLD; Destroyer Escorts, U.S. Reply to U-Boats, Being Built at Record Speed TRAINING FOR SEA PRAISED Admiral Randall Tells How the Maritime Service Prepares Men for Wartime Jobs

lead_paragraph: The Navy's answer to the challenge of the submarine, the destroyer escort, is being turned out in privately operated shipyards at a rate never before equaled on combat ships of a similar tonnage, according to an announcement made yesterday by the Shipbuilders Council of America.
abstract: To leave Montreal for Greece with supplies
